name: Powerful Tongue
text: Unlike others of your kind, you are able to pull your prey toward yourself.
benefit: Your tongue attack gains the pull special ability. At the start of your turn, if your tongue is attached to a target of your size or smaller and you succeed at a combat maneuver check, you can pull the target 5 feet closer to you as free action.
text_zh: 和你的大多数同类不同，你的舌头强健到可以将被粘住的猎物拖近你的位置。
prerequisites_zh: 力量17，粘性舌头特殊攻击。
benefit_zh: 你的舌击攻击可以进行拖拽（Pull）特殊攻击。在你的回合开始时，只要你的舌头粘住一个体型不大于你的生物，你就可以通过一次成功的战技攻击检定，以一个自由动作将它拉近你5尺。
